eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
W_{\it full}\!\!&=&\!\!
S\left(\ln {\Lambda_0^{2(N_c-N_f^M)}m_A^{N_c-N_f^M}\over S^{N_c-N_f^M}}
+N_c-N_f^M\right)-\tau S\nonumber\\
&+&\!\!S\ln {\Lambda_0^{2N_f^M}\over \det M} - {1\over 2 m_A}\mathop{{\rm Tr}}[M^2]
+S\ln{\det m \over \Lambda^{N_f^m}_0}\nonumber\\
&-&\sum_m 
S\left[{1\over 2}+{1\over 4k_mS}\left(\sqrt{1-{4k_mS}}-1\right)
-\ln({1\over 2}+{1\over 2}\sqrt{1-{4k_mS}})\right]\nonumber\\
&=&\!\!-{1\over 2 m_A}\mathop{{\rm Tr}}[M^2]+
S\left(\ln {\Lambda^{3N_c-N_f}\det m\over S^{N_c-N_f^M}\det M}
+N_c-N_f^M\right)\nonumber\\
&-&\!\!\sum_m 
S\left[{1\over 2}+{1\over 4k_mS}\left(\sqrt{1-{4k_mS}}-1\right)
-\ln({1\over 2}+{1\over 2}\sqrt{1-{4k_mS}})\right]
\label{Wfull}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal F}_{\it massive}&=&\sum_{i=1}^{N_f^m}{\cal F}(m_i)\\
{\cal F}(m)&=&S\left[-{1\over 2}-{1\over 4\alpha_m S}(\sqrt{1-4\alpha_m S}-1)
+\ln\left[{1\over 2}+{1\over 2}\sqrt{1-4\alpha_m S}\right]\right]\nonumber
\
